__e: The last conversation with my wife - in the background I heard a child's voice...
but every time I made it outside,
And every time I saw you, every time I heard your voice, all I could think to myself was, "Jesus, what I wouldn't give."
I could barely hear because she's hanging all over me trying to listen... but there's no way I wouldn't recognize that voice.
I wouldn't mind, if I knew what you're saying what do you want to know?
And just as I did as a child when faced with something I didn't wanna hear,
I kept hearing about an uncle... who'd gone off to America.
I didn't even hear about your mom and dad till a couple of years ago. And by then, you were already grown-up.
He said he didn't know anything, hadn't heard from you in years.
I ended up having a nervous breakdown and hearing voices, and had to go to the hospital because of it.
He used to tell me there was voices speaking to him in his head all the time.
I just kept hearing Mickey's voice in my head over and over again. I just dug down, and before you know it it was toe to toe and it was...
